After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the utilization rate of service center capacity.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.FORMULA: (Current Service Center Utilization / Total Available Capacity) * 100

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the average wait time for customers at service centers.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.FORMULA: Total Wait Time for Service Requests / Total Number of Service Requests

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time taken to complete repairs at service centers.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.FORMULA: Total Time for Repairs / Total Number of Repairs

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of repairs fixed on the first attempt.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.FORMULA: (Number of Issues Resolved on First Attempt / Total Number of Issues) * 100

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.KPIS: Customer satisfaction with service center experience
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.EXPLANATION: Measures customer satisfaction with their experience at service centers.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.FORMULA: Average Rating of Customer Satisfaction with Service Center Experience

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the average cost per repair at service centers.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.FORMULA: Total Repair Costs / Total Number of Repairs

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the productivity of staff at service centers.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.FORMULA: Total Number of Repairs Completed / Total Staff Hours

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the number of pending repairs at service centers.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Service.FORMULA: Total Number of Pending Service Requests
